tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Finished T51 at 2015 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.carHigh: Played on the Swing Thought Tour.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Named to the 2010 National Freshman Team...Named 2010 GCAA Conference Freshman of the Year at Georgia Southern University...2010 and 2011 GCAA All-Conference Team...2010 PING All-Region...2011 Fellowship of Christian Athletes Award Recipient...Won the individual title at the 2012 North Augusta Persimmon Hill Classic.
tourBios.personal: Attended Pensacola Catholic High School in Pensacola, Fla...Older sister, Danielle, played college golf at the University of West Florida...Younger brother, Spencer plays golf at the University of West Florida...Father also played college golf at the University of West Florida and was an All-American...Would choose "Wild Thing" by the Troggs as his walk-up song on the first tee...At 5 years old, he begged the golf association in Pensacola to let him play in the 6-7 age group because it was the youngest age group. They let him play despite his age, and he won his first tournament...Biggest thrills outside golf include watching the New Orleans Saints in the Superdome, reeling in a big red fish or shooting a big buck...Golf superstitions include using a half dollar as a marker, always keeping tees in his left pocket and always a coin and one pencil in his right...Not many people know that he was named Altar Server of the Year for the State of Florida in the 8th grade...Charitable involvements include The First Tee of Northwest Florida and the Huntsman Cancer Institute.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour in 2016 is T30th at the El Bosque Mexico Championship presented by INNOVA.
